recommended_degree: Manajemen Transportasi Laut, Manajemen Transportasi, Manajemen Logistik, Manajemen Pelabuhan Dan Logistik Maritim, Logistik Perdagangan Internasional (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: Process import documentation, coordinating with shipping lines and customs brokers, tracking vessel arrivals, and ensuring timely data entry for incoming shipments. The role also includes supporting report preparation, filing, and daily administrative tasks related to ocean import operations.
